name: PilotBar - GitHub Copilot Monitor
description:
Monitor your GitHub Copilot quota and usage from the GNOME top bar.

Features:
* Real-time quota monitoring in top bar
* OAuth authentication (no manual tokens needed)
* Auto-refresh every 5 minutes
* One-click access to GitHub usage page

Note: This extension accesses the clipboard during OAuth authentication to copy the verification code for your convenience.
